full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Budget Bureau No. 43-R076.4. IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE DUPLICATE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA No. 7843 (To accompany monthly report on DECLARATION OF INTENTION Form N-4) United States of America In the United States District Court District of Minnesota SS: Fourth Division of Minnesota at Minneapolis (1) My full, true, and correct name is HERBERT STANGEL (Full, true name, without abbreviation, and any (2) My present place of other name which has been used, must appear here) residence is 3237 Girard Ave. So. Minneapolis Hennepin Minnesota (Number and street) (City or town) (County) (State) (3) I was born October 28, 1905 in Vienna Austria (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) (County, district, province, or State) (Country) (4) My personal description is as follows: Sex male , complexion fair -9 color of eyes brown , color of hair brown , height 6 feet 1 inches, weight 210 pounds, visible distinctive marks 1st joints missing, index & middle fingers, Lft country hand. of which I am a citizen, subject, or national Great Britain (5) I am married; the name of my wife or husband is Milada Stangel (6) My lawful admission for permanent residence in the United States was at Detroit, Michigan (City or town) (State) under the name of Herbert Stangel on April 27. 1957 (Month) (Day) (Year) on the in my own-car and I am now residing in (Name of vessel or other means of conveyance) the United States pursuant to such admission. (7) It is my intention in good faith to become a citizen of the United States. (8) I certify that the photograph affixed to the duplicate and triplicate hereof is a likeness of me and was signed by me. I do swear (affirm) that the statements I have made and the intentions I have expressed in this declaration of intention subscribed by me are true to the best of my knowledge and belief: SO HELP ME GOD. Herbert Fancel (Original and true signature of declarant without abbreviation, also other name if used) Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me in the form of oath shown above in the office of the Clerk of said Court, at Minneapolis Minnesota this 16th day of July , anno Domini 19 57 I hereby certify that authorization for the issu- ance of this declaration has been received by me from the Immigration ENTLY and Naturalization Service, and that the photograph affixed to the duplicate and triplicate hereof is a likeness of the declarant. ERE) COUNT GOS FRANK A. MASSEY 1221 MO -S Clerk of the U. S. DISTRICT [SEAL] By Helen WINN m Charce Court) (The seal of the court will be impressed so as to cover a portion of the photograph) RECEIVED Deputy Clerk. Form N-315 U. 6. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE 16-67747-4 (Rev. 9-12-56)
